title.narrative: 2012 Project "Beyond Education / Africa Careers Network" - MCF Scholars Program

description.narrative: ALA seeks to transform Africa by fostering the development of young, entrepreneurial, ethical African leaders through training, practical experience, mentoring, and career connections.ALA will develop and test a university matching service that prepares and places competitive yet economically disadvantaged African students with universities wanting to increase representation from students of this profile. It will also help with the orientation and leadership training among scholars and graduates.
